Atul Kaushik is an Android Engineer. He is an Android enthusiast and an open source fanatic. He works with the Android development community at large to aid in understanding the Android platform and development of good quality Android applications. He likes to work on open source applications during his free time. He is passionate about travelling and swimming. He actively participates in social causes. He is currently working on an open source application which requires generous contributions. You can reach him on kaushik.atul@gmail.com

SMS Wrapper is an open source app which intends to make messaging a fun. It has been developed with limited resources so you may get disappointed at times, but as you continue to support this initiative, you will find improvements in future realeases. Please drop your feedbacks at kaushik.atul@gmail.com which will greatly help the author to undersatnd your requirements and hence improve user experience
Funny extra overflow menu icon on larger screens
Inconsistent messaging received "Network not available" but issue really was IMAP not enabled on gmail account
